document.full_text: on tuesday, the lede continues to supplement reporting from our colleagues in japan on the aftermath of a devastating 9.0 earthquake, including efforts to control damaged nuclear reactors.
document.title: the lede: march 15 updates on japan's nuclear crisis and earthquake aftermath
lines_and_colors: on tuesday, the lede continues to supplement reporting from our colleagues in japan on the aftermath of a devastating 9.0 earthquake, including efforts to control damaged nuclear reactors.
